verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hear O Lord and answer
I am poor and needy
Guard my life
For I am devoted to You
Hear my prayer O Lord
And my cry for mercy
In this day of trouble
I will call to You

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Teach me O Lord
I will walk in Your truth
Give me an undivided heart
Nations You've made
Will worship You
For You alone
Are the living God

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I will praise You
I will praise You
Glorify Your name O Lord
I will praise You
I will praise You
Glorify Your name O Lord
